title: Athletism — Climbing (Elite) — Phase 10: Peak & Performance Maintenance
equipment: Gym: rack, barbells, dumbbells, kettlebells, cables
Weighted vest, sandbags, farmer carry handles
Rock shoes, approach shoes, helmet, rope (as needed)
goal: Express fitness on objective days; micro‑dose intensity; CNS sharp.

warmup: Activation 8' (scap control, deep core, glute med)
Easy traverse or banded forearm prep 5'
main: Primer: 3x(45'' easy boulder flow / 2' easy) + 3x5 MB throws
Short power: 3x2 clean pulls (light) + jump squats 3x3
Hike/climb: 1–2 short laps at target pace; stop fresh

notes: Week 1: one rehearsal + one primer. Week 2: 48–72h taper pre‑objective.
